attributes.action: Pay all school support staff for 52 weeks of the year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We wish to be paid for 52 weeks of the year and not on a term time basis. As the role of support staff has changed and we are now involved more with childrens learning. Our role is now more like a teachers role and we want to be paid like the teachers yearly not term time.
